statements: UPDATE inter_chain_transactions SET amount = 100 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE inter_chain_transactions SET amount = 1000 WHERE sender_address = '0x12345' AND receiver_address = '0x67890';
UPDATE inter_chain_transactions SET transaction_time = '2022-01-15 12:00:00' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE inter_chain_transactions SET sender_address='0x123ABC', receiver_address='0x456DEF' WHERE transaction_id=1001;
UPDATE atomic_swaps SET swap_status='completed', swap_amount=5000 WHERE swap_id=2002;
UPDATE inter_chain_transactions SET sender_address = '0x123456', amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE atomic_swaps SET swap_status = 'completed', swap_amount = 500.75 WHERE swap_id = 10;

UPDATE atomic_swaps SET timestamp = '2022-01-10 14:30:00' WHERE swap_id = 56789;
UPDATE inter_chain_transactions SET amount = 5000.00, timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE transaction_id = 100;

UPDATE InterChainTransactions SET amount = 1500.50 WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE AtomicSwaps SET status = 'Completed' WHERE swap_id = 201;
UPDATE InterChainTransactions SET amount = 500.25, sender_chain = 'Ethereum' WHERE transaction_id = 100;

UPDATE interchain_transactions SET amount = 200.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE atomic_swaps SET status = 'COMPLETED', expiry_time = '2021-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE swap_id = 5;
UPDATE interchain_transactions SET from_chain = 'Ethereum', to_chain = 'Binance Smart Chain' WHERE amount > 1000;
UPDATE atomic_swaps SET status = 'Completed', expiry_time = '2023-01-01 00:00:00' WHERE swap_amount = 500;
